text: Rabbi Yisrael Moshe Friedman (23 July 1955 - 10 August 2020) was an American- Israeli rabbi. He was the sixth Rebbe of the Sadigura chasidus. He led his court from Bnei Brak, Israel. He was the sixth rebbe between 2013 until his death. He was born in New York City. Friedman died on 10 August 2020 in Ramat Gan, Israel at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American rabbis Category:Israeli rabbis Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Writers from New York City
title: Yisrael Moshe Friedman
